tech_news.title: Amazon Restocks Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart Bundle Deal - Save $50 While You Can - GameSpot
tech_news.description: After selling out on Cyber Monday, Amazon has rejoined Walmart in offering a surprising deal on the Nintendo Switch 2 console bundle with Mario Kart World.

tech_news.title: ‘Destiny 2: Renegades’ Begins The Strangest ‘Star Wars’ Experiment To Date - Forbes
tech_news.description: Destiny 2 is taking a huge swing with a licensed Star Wars expansion that does not actually function as a Star Wars game in Renegades.

tech_news.title: Fallout 76: Burning Springs Release Notes - Bethesda.net
tech_news.description: Grab your duster, hat, and your favorite weapon because it’s time for some Bounty Hunting! Explore our largest map addition yet and hunt down some of the largest bounties Burning Springs has to offer.

tech_news.title: Minecraft’s new version numbering system - Minecraft
tech_news.description: We’re making changes to version numbering in Minecraft. Now the version number will be based on calendar year, e.g. “26” for 2026, followed by the release number. We hope this'll make it easier to distinguish major releases from patches or hotfixes. Find out …

tech_news.title: Mistral closes in on Big AI rivals with new open-weight frontier and small models - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Mistral unveils its Mistral 3 lineup, including a frontier model and efficient small models designed for offline, customizable enterprise use — aiming to prove small, fine-tuned AI can beat closed-source giants.

tech_news.title: “Players are selfish”: Fallout 2’s Chris Avellone describes his game design philosophy - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Avellone recaps his journey from learning on a TRS-80 to today.

tech_news.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a technical marvel and game design nightmare - NPR
tech_news.description: After a decade of development, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a beautiful but befuddling game full of misguided design decisions and annoying sidekicks.

tech_news.title: 30 practical smart home gifts that make everyday life a little easier - The Verge
tech_news.description: If you want to help a loved one upgrade their home this holiday season, here are some of our favorite gifts, from robot vacuums and smart pizza ovens to rugs.
